name: Dorian Electra
description: '''Dorian Electra Fridkin Gomberg''' (born June 25, 1992) is an American singer and songwriter. Electra is known for their non-conforming fashion, queer aesthetics, and [[experimental pop]] sound. Their debut studio album, ''[[Flamboyant (album)|Flamboyant]]'', was released in 2019, followed by their second studio album, ''[[My Agenda]]'', in 2020. They released their third studio album, ''Fanfare,'' in 2023. Electra is [[genderfluid]] and uses ''they/them'' pronouns.
